snippet.title: Iron Danger - Teaser
snippet.description:
Iron Danger by Finnish developer Action Squad Studios will release in March 2020!

Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/899310/Iron_Danger/

-- About The Game --

Iron Danger is a tactical combat game with a unique time manipulation mechanic. A never before seen combination that combines the tactical depth of turn-based games with the exciting action of real-time games.

https://irondanger.com/
https://twitter.com/irondangerworld
https://www.facebook.com/irondangerworld/

-- Action Squad Studios --

https://actionsquadstudios.com/
https://twitter.com/Action_Squad
https://www.facebook.com/actionsquadstudios/

-- Follow us on Social Media -- 
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/daedalic 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/daedalic 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/daedalicentertainment
